datas.text: Your mother cooked a healthy vegetable soup.

choices.choice_text: Try to enjoy the meal and thank her properly
choices.popUpText: She got very happy and hugged you. But It tasted terrible!

choices.choice_text: Pour it into the flower pot while she looks away
choices.popUpText: You missed a good healthy meal!

choices.choice_text: Get angry, but force yourself to drink it
choices.popUpText: You upset your mother, show some manners!

datas.text: A kid kicked you by mistake while playing catch.

choices.popUpText: You made him cry. Your parents were not happy! But deep inside you enjoyed it.

choices.choice_text: Brush it off and keep playing
choices.popUpText: You had a wonderful time together and you got respect among your friends.
He got angry and kicked you again!

datas.text: Your parents got into a serious argument.

choices.popUpText: Mom won the argument with your support. Dad wasn't happy.
Mom found it cute that you try to help your dad, things eased off nicely.

choices.choice_text: Start crying to get their attention
choices.popUpText: They stopped arguing to look after you. But you hurt yourself to cry.

datas.text: You broke your mom's favorite vase.

choices.popUpText: She respected your honesty and hugged you.
Your mom believed you and scorned your dad.
Your mom realized the cracks and grounded you.

datas.text: There is a loud thunderstorm outside.

choices.popUpText: Your parents found it cute and let you sleep in their bed.

choices.choice_text: Go outside to enjoy the rain
choices.popUpText: You were struck by a thunder! You are a crazy kid!

choices.choice_text: Try to soothe your little brother who got afraid
choices.popUpText: Your parents loved it. You are such a kind elder sibling.

datas.text: You saw an injured mouse outside.

choices.choice_text: Take it in and try to patch it up
choices.popUpText: With your father's help, you healed the bird. But mom was not happy!
The mouse got angry and jumped on your face!

choices.choice_text: Give it to a stray cat
choices.popUpText: The cat paid you nicely. Wait, what?!

datas.text: There is an injured bird in the garden.

choices.choice_text: Take it in and try to patch it up
choices.popUpText: With your mother's help, you healed the bird.
It was actually a government robot for spying, it shot lasers at you!
After a few hours, you regretted not helping the poor bird.

datas.text: You are waiting at the dentist.

choices.choice_text: Take a car's magazine to read
choices.popUpText: One day, you will buy that sports car!
You thought that Picasso is over-rated.
You read an article about superhero experiments, cool!

datas.text: Your cousin got a new gaming console.

choices.popUpText: Your cousin was devastated as her console broke down. You are a monster!

choices.choice_text: Ask her permission to play games together
choices.popUpText: You had great fun together and your parents liked your manners.

choices.choice_text: Cry to your parents for a gaming console
choices.popUpText: After hours of tantrums, your dad was forced to buy you a new PC.

datas.text: Your father bought himself a cheesecake.

choices.popUpText: He gladly gave you some slices. Why would not he?!

choices.choice_text: Offer your mom to eat it together
choices.popUpText: You enjoyed the cake together. But you faced your father's wrath later in the day when he found out.

choices.choice_text: Swap it with a frozen pizza and eat the cake
choices.popUpText: Your father did not realize the swap and blamed the bakery for the weird-tasting cheesecake.

datas.text: A homeless wants you to treat him for free.

choices.choice_text: Offer free treatment out of your pocket
choices.popUpText: It made you feel good to help him.

choices.choice_text: Use his body to make experiments
choices.popUpText: He turned into a mutant and escaped!
He gave you a beating!

datas.text: A critical patient needs a risky surgery.

choices.popUpText: That inexperienced surgeon killed the patient. You regret it deeply.
You managed to save the patient's life. Their rich family rewarded you nicely.
While you were away from the hospital, the patient passeed away. Are you happy now?!

datas.text: A shady company wants you to test their products on patients.

choices.popUpText: Their well-paid lawyer made things terrible for you! But you felt good anyway.

choices.choice_text: Accept it in return of lots of money
choices.popUpText: You harmed lots of patients with the products. It made you a little bit sad until you got a huge check!

choices.choice_text: Take the products and pretend to be using them
choices.popUpText: The company realized your scam and a group of thugs gave you a beating!

datas.text: You found yourself in a gunfight against some thugs.

choices.choice_text: Act boldly and jump into the fray
choices.popUpText: You managed to defeat them, but got injured in the process. They gave you a medal of John Wick.
While you were waiting, the thugs ran away. Well done!
You saved yourself. But the other cops gave you a nickname: 'Chicken'

datas.text: You found yourself in a high-speed highway chase.

choices.popUpText: The suspect drove away and escaped. At least you are in one piece.

choices.choice_text: Push the pedal to the metal
choices.popUpText: You crashed the suspect's vehicle. The other cops praised your heroics, but you got some injuries.

choices.choice_text: Take a turn and visit a donut shop instead
choices.popUpText: Your superior was also there. You both tried to ignore each other and enjoy the donuts.

datas.text: A bank robber took a hostage.

choices.popUpText: Robber acted faster and killed the hostage. Shame on you!

choices.choice_text: Try to act carefully and negotiate
choices.popUpText: It did not work and the robber escaped with the hostage. Now you have to chase the guy all day!

choices.choice_text: Go around the building and sneak up on him
choices.popUpText: You stunned him and saved the hostage. Years of playing video games finally paid off.

datas.text: Tomorrow there is an exam, but a friend invites you to party.

choices.popUpText: That was a crazy night, but the exam on the next day was crazier.
You could not have fun, but who needs fun when you can get A+ ?

choices.choice_text: Take your textbook to the party
choices.popUpText: The crazed party people made paper planes from the textbook, you can't remember the rest of the events from the night.

datas.text: Another student wants you to help them during an exam.

choices.popUpText: She kept whispering you and ruined your concentration. It was a terrible exam.

choices.choice_text: Turn your paper to show the answers
choices.popUpText: She mixed up the answers and failed anyway. She later gave you some money for help.
Professor took her out of the classroom. You continued your exam in peace.

datas.text: You participate in a group project.

choices.choice_text: Slack off and let them do the job
choices.popUpText: The project failed and all of them blamed you.

choices.choice_text: Work hard and help the team
choices.popUpText: The project was a huge success. It was quite boring though.

choices.choice_text: Pretend to be working but do nothing
choices.popUpText: They did not realize it and you had all the fun while they worked.

datas.text: You have lots of money.

choices.popUpText: What happens in Vegas stays in Vegas. Well, your money stayed there for sure.
It felt great!
You increased your wealth. But it feels a bit selfish.

datas.text: Some cops want you to spy on your own mafia.

choices.choice_text: Accept their offer and expose the secrets of the mafia
choices.popUpText: With your efforts, the mafia was taken down by the cops. You lost your job, but earned a lot of money.
You were shot by the cops, and barely escaped. At least you proved your loyalty to the mafia.
You misled the cops and they made an arrest on the town's most charitable businessman. Haha!

datas.text: One of your closest friends betrayed the mafia.

choices.popUpText: You felt bad hurting your friend, but no one betrays the family!
Years later you got a mail from Madagascar. He is safe and sound!

choices.choice_text: Help him fight against the mafia
choices.popUpText: You fought off the mafia and managed to escape, but got some injuries. At least you protected your friendship.

datas.text: The mafia needs a new project.

choices.popUpText: It was a succesful heist. You got some ill-earned cash.
One of the cops provided great information and your mafia flourished.

choices.choice_text: Organize a laser tag tournament against rival mafias
choices.popUpText: Your weird idea was accepted, but the laser tag games turned into violent shootouts. You barely made out of the mall alive.

datas.text: A dictator wants to visit your country

choices.popUpText: Even though the guy is evil, his wealth is too much to ignore, you know?
You felt proud and honorable, but those trade deals would help a lot.
It was a tropical island nation and you had a nice vacation. The dictator was also happy.

datas.text: A new bill awaits to be signed

choices.choice_text: Listen to the Orange Party and sign it
choices.popUpText: The new bill will help the poor people, but your own wealth is impacted negatively.

choices.choice_text: Listen to the Yellow Party and disapprove it
choices.popUpText: You gave more power to the corporations and amassed some wealth.

choices.choice_text: Ignore and let the congress handle it
choices.popUpText: That is why the people loves you!

datas.text: You need to prepare a speech for the Independence Day.

choices.popUpText: People cried, some shouted in excitement. That was a very moving speech. Wow!
You failed to make the audience laugh, no one likes your dad-jokes!

choices.choice_text: Let your aide write something up
choices.popUpText: It was a terrible speech and people mocked you on social media for days. You had to hire a new aide.

datas.text: The United Nations condemn your monarchy.

choices.choice_text: Bomb some of the member countries
choices.popUpText: It was nice to teach them a lesson, but those bombs are quite expensive!

choices.choice_text: Do some reforms to appease them
choices.popUpText: You got even more criticism, you can never satisfy their demands as a monarch.

choices.choice_text: Hire a professional social media team
choices.popUpText: They painted a totally different picture of you on the internet. Whole world loves you now!

datas.text: You heard about a brewing farmer rebellion

choices.choice_text: Takeover the lands from the farmers
choices.popUpText: It made the people even more angry. A series of revolts brought down your monarchy!

choices.choice_text: Give them some rights and benefits
choices.popUpText: It provided some relief and your popularity was increased.
One of the assassins mixed his targets and attacked you. You barely saved your life!

datas.text: You are very bored. What to do?

choices.popUpText: You got quite bored halfway through and decided go back to your castle.

choices.choice_text: Build an arena and reintroduce gladiator fights
choices.popUpText: Whole world was shocked with your new form of entertainment. People fight each other to death, so what?!

choices.choice_text: Command Elon Mask to take you to space
choices.popUpText: He had to obey you as his king and you took a space travel with one of his rockets. That was fun.

datas.text: A meteor is coming down to Earth!

choices.choice_text: Jump up and face it head-on!
choices.popUpText: You smashed the meteor into harmless little rocks. But you were badly hurt. What a hero!
There was no time left to empty the city. The meteor hit the ground with massive force. You were injured as well.

choices.choice_text: Gather all superheroes to blow it up in space
choices.popUpText: Combined power of the superheroes stopped the meteor in space. You saved the day!

datas.text: During a villain attack, you are forced to pick who to save.

choices.popUpText: It was actually one of the villain's minions in disguise to trick you. You wasted your time!
After you saved the politician, he funded your superhero operations.
When you see the joy in the child's eyes, it made you extremely happy.

datas.text: A scientist offers to enhance your powers.

choices.popUpText: You feel new ideas rushing to your brain. You feel like Einstein!
You have already so much muscle power that it hurts your body instead of enhancing it.
You suddenly started seeing geometric shapes in objects.

datas.text: That mutant you created attacked your house.

choices.popUpText: It is very strong. After beating you for a while, he got bored and left.
He did not like your idea of working as a superhero, but you confused him so much that he left the house.
He ate the money and started to beat you. After getting bored, he left your house.

datas.text: A kid at school is constantly bullying you.

choices.popUpText: That kid is quite a monster and he smashed you into the ground. Now you know how it feels like to be a wrestler.
The principal handled the issue swiftly as the kid was expelled from the school. The other bullies started calling you 'the rat.'
You realized that bullying is quite enjoyable and you became friends. Your parents did not find it that much enjoyable though.

datas.text: Your father took you to a NASCAR race.

choices.popUpText: The bananas made a car slide and it caused a massive accident. They forced your dad to pay for the damage.

choices.choice_text: Tease your father that he can't drive as fast as them
choices.popUpText: On the way back home, he drove like mad and crashed. You broke your nose!
Of course you could not enjoy anything. What is the point of watching cars turning around for 300 laps?!

datas.text: A visiting teacher from Hogwarts presented each student with a choice among three different magic balls.

choices.popUpText: This ball gave your brain some magical power. You finally how to multiply numbers.
This ball gave you strength. No one can bully you now. Unless they also picked the red ball...
You suddenly started feeling artsy. You drew moustaches on the family album photos.

datas.text: You have house chores to do.

choices.popUpText: Your mother was quite happy with your performance, albeit a few broken glasses.
A raccoon attacked you and injured you. Never throw out the trash alone!
Say goodbye to your pocket money, but at least you completed all levels of Brain Test: Tricky Puzzles.

datas.text: A shady looking guy started to follow you.

choices.choice_text: Run to the nearest police station
choices.popUpText: He gave you a chase and caught you. He stole some money from you.
It turned into a staring contest and he got scared by your flashing gaze. Ha, get lost!

choices.choice_text: Lie down and pretend to be dead
choices.popUpText: He came and sniffed you. Then took some of your money and ran away.

datas.text: You went to a party.

choices.choice_text: Stay calm and chat with people
choices.popUpText: Well, that was a quite boring party. But at least you did not do anything regrettable.

choices.choice_text: Try to get friendly with the popular guy
choices.popUpText: He mocked you in front of everybody else. It hurt you deeply, but this pain gave you some muses as well.
You had great fun, at least as far as you can remember. You found yourself awake on someone's porch with no shoes.

datas.text: You have to take a very bad tasting pill.

choices.choice_text: Take it and drink lots of water
choices.popUpText: Your mother is happy that you are taking the medicine. But the taste lingers for hours! Eww...
Your parents got angry. Also it was not good for your health.

choices.choice_text: Put it into your mouth and spit it secretly
choices.popUpText: You tricked your parents, but what about your own body? You needed those pills!

datas.text: A very hard exam is coming.

choices.popUpText: You managed to cheat and pass the exam, but you should have learnt those things!
You pushed the limits and managed to finish reading all of class materials, only to realize you studied for the wrong exam!
Your dad believed you that you are sick and took you to the hospital. You got some other illness there and spent weeks in misery!

datas.text: While hiking, you came across a man lying down on the ground.

choices.choice_text: Check him up and try to help
choices.popUpText: It turned out he had a heart attack, but with your intervention he survived after you called the ambulance. A few months later you got a check from him. It was a rich guy!
Another hiker saw you robbing him and attacked you. You had to run away in shame. But you got some cash.
Later that day, you saw the ghost of that man. He was quite furious!

datas.text: A beggar asks for money.

choices.popUpText: He thanked you and gave you some very important life lessons on art, physics and fitness. I have no idea how...
He punched you and you spun 5 times before falling down to the ground.

choices.choice_text: You ask for money from him instead
choices.popUpText: He got sad that you are poorer and gave you some of his beggar-earned cash.

datas.text: After exiting the supermarket, you realized that one of the items is missing on the receipt.

choices.choice_text: Go back to the market to pay for it
choices.popUpText: You felt relieved to fix this problem. You are a true person of law and order.
Well, it was just a cereal after all. But, your conscience kept you awake all night afterwards.

choices.choice_text: Go back and yell at the cashier for the mistake
choices.popUpText: You rushed in and turned the place upside down like a Karen. They had to give you a gift card to shut you up.

datas.text: You found a worm in your apple.

choices.choice_text: Eat the apple with the worm
choices.popUpText: Some extra protein, nice!
The worm came out of the apple and colonized your kitchen. You had to call an exterminator.

choices.choice_text: Take out the worm and keep eating
choices.popUpText: There were even more more worms inside and you ate a few pieces of them. Eww...

datas.text: Your friends invited you to a Japanese restaurant, but you don't know how to use the chopsticks.

choices.popUpText: You made a mess and your friends mocked you harshly. A true shame!
They acted kindly and showed you how to use them. Then you dropped a piece into the ramen bowl and splashed everyone.
You managed to eat like a decent person, the restaurant owner was not so happy though.

datas.text: You saw an UFO in the forest.

choices.choice_text: Try to record it with your phone
choices.popUpText: Their auto-defense mechanism broke down your phone. You are forced to buy a new one.
They opened fire with laser guns. You barely escaped from there.
They landed in front of you. One of them came out and shook your hands. Later you woke up with some extra holes on your body.

datas.text: The bathroom faucet is leaking.

choices.popUpText: You managed to fix it by following some Utube tutorials. You felt great afterwards.
He fixed the problem, but ripped you off nicely as usual.
Your house was flooded during the night. Your favorite carpet was wasted!

datas.text: You hit a pedestrian while driving.

choices.choice_text: Stop and check on their condition
choices.popUpText: Luckily he was not injured seriously. He forgave you and you parted ways.
A few days later police showed up on your doorstep. But they were just searching for a fugitive in the vicinity. Phew!

choices.choice_text: Stop and pretend to be having a heart attack
choices.popUpText: You over-pretended and really had a heart attack! You stayed in the hospital for a while.

datas.text: A Nigerian Prince sent you an e-mail asking for help.

choices.popUpText: He was really a prince and sent you a huge amount of money after a few days.
In retaliation, they hacked your pc. You had to format the whole drive. What a waste!

choices.choice_text: Send him Monopoly money in an envelope
choices.popUpText: You got an e-mail later: He wants the rest of the game pieces. You had to give away your favorite boardgame.

datas.text: While flying your helicopter, you suddenly started to lose altitude!

choices.popUpText: You opened your parachute and saved your life. But the helicopter went boom!
You managed to land it safely, but you were nearly having a heart attack.
It somehow worked and you regained control. Your amazing barrel roll video became trending on the internet.

datas.text: Your spouse looks bored.

choices.popUpText: Your spouse did not find it amusing and slapped you. 'I am not your child!'
You enjoyed a happy meal together. It lifted your spouse's spirits!

choices.choice_text: Act even more bored and sad
choices.popUpText: In return, your spouse became more depressed. The house turned as cold as a mausoleum.

datas.text: It is your spouse's birthday!

choices.popUpText: It was a killer clown! He started shooting people at the party. You and your spouse barely survived!
It made your spouse very happy and you spent a nice evening together watching the Lion King for the 54th time.

choices.choice_text: Surprise your spouse with your friends
choices.popUpText: While waiting in the dark to surprise, your spouse murmured something bad about one of the friends waiting. It ruined the mood for the night.

datas.text: Your spouse is constantly texting someone secretly on the phone.

choices.choice_text: Try to take their phone secretly
choices.popUpText: It was just your spouse's best friend and they are planning a surprise party for you. You feel ashamed of yourself.

choices.choice_text: Get angry and force them to explain
choices.popUpText: Your spouse got sad that you don't trust. It was revealed your spouse was simply planning a surprise party for you.
A few days later your spouse and the friends surprised you with a party. So that was all about it!

datas.text: Your lover wants some money.

choices.popUpText: It turns out the lover was going to surprise you with a new phone you always wanted!
You could not handle the break-up and cried for weeks.

choices.choice_text: Don't give but try to explain
choices.popUpText: Hearing about your poverty, your lover got sad and gave you money instead.

datas.text: Your child is constantly crying.

choices.popUpText: You loved the headset and managed to zone-out. After a few weeks you suddenly realized you were alone in the house! Where did they go?!

choices.choice_text: Try to understand the child's problem
choices.popUpText: Turns out your child was being harassed by a ghost in the bathroom. You hired an exorcist and handled the issue.

choices.choice_text: Shout at them to be silent
choices.popUpText: Your child was afraid and went to crying silently in their room. You felt terrible afterwards.

datas.text: Your child broke a kid's arm.

choices.popUpText: You turned your child into a bully, your partner was not happy about it.
Your child took a lesson in your punishment. They told you, 'I must not leave any evidence next time.' Excuse me, what?!

choices.choice_text: Pay money to the victim's family
choices.popUpText: They agreed to remain silent. But this encouraged your child to act even more badly.

datas.text: Your child seeks career advice.

choices.popUpText: A few days later, your kid came home with some cash. You found out that they robbed a store!
Your kid delved into drawing and painting. It makes you feel a bit happy, but you might be forced to save some money for his poor future.
Your kid started reading MBA books. You were fascinated!

datas.text: You started to forget things.

choices.choice_text: Panic and try to remember everything
choices.popUpText: Your brain is overwhelmed and you feel tired. You forgot even more now!

choices.choice_text: Calm down and play some puzzle games
choices.popUpText: Playing puzzle games helped your memory. You finally remember the name of that annoying kindergarten teacher.
It helped your memory, but there were some side effects on your muscles.

datas.text: You feel a bit lonely.

choices.popUpText: Loud music, flashing lights and annoying crazy young people. You had a terrible night!
Your friend is so old that she could not hear what you say on the phone. It was just a ping pong of yellings.

choices.choice_text: Enter to chat rooms on the internet.
choices.popUpText: You found an interesting guy who gave you some life advice. You were fascinated deeply.

datas.text: What to do on the weekend?

choices.popUpText: One of the birds got angry for your privacy violation and pecked your head.

choices.choice_text: Sit down on your rocking chair and watch TV
choices.popUpText: There was an interesting show about a man trying to survive in his backyard. It was so intense!
You fell down and broke some bones. You don't even want to know which ones!

datas.text: During the night, you hear violent voices from the neighbor's house.

choices.popUpText: Your neighbor was fighting a burglar, you helped them and the burglar escaped.
The police came too late and the burglar in the neighbor's house escaped.
You are not kind enough to sacrifice your sleep for such matters.

datas.text: You are having trouble passing a level at Brain Test: Tricky Puzzles.

choices.popUpText: It worked! This silly game works mysteriously. Now you have to buy a new phone though.
Your friend mocked you for playing that game.

choices.choice_text: Look for the answer on the internet
choices.popUpText: You found it! You just needed to shake the phone.

datas.text: Your parents want you to help them for their house renovations.

choices.popUpText: It pleased them a lot. But your clumsy mistakes costed some extra money.

choices.choice_text: Hire a specialist and send him
choices.popUpText: The specialist did a great job. They were pleased.
They were very disappointed in you.

datas.text: You saw a truck coming down the hill with no brakes. And there is a child on the way!

choices.popUpText: You grabbed the child and saved her from getting hit by the truck.

choices.choice_text: Get into the closest building to save yourself
choices.popUpText: You heard some nasty sounds from the outside, but at least you were safe.

choices.choice_text: Try to jump into the track to stop it
choices.popUpText: It has no brakes! At least you steered it away from the child, only to get into a store. You had to pay for damage.

datas.text: You saw a woman unable to pay for her groceries at the market.

choices.popUpText: The woman thanked you a lot. Seeing your kind act, the store manager gave you a gift card. You actually profited!
The poor woman had to go out empty handed. It made you a bit sad.

choices.choice_text: Yell at them for keeping the line waiting
choices.popUpText: The woman cried and rushed out. The cashier gave you some disgusted looks.

datas.text: You saw two kids fighting over a cookie.

choices.choice_text: Go buy a box of cookies and give them equal amounts
choices.popUpText: They got extremely happy and became friendly with each other.

choices.choice_text: Stop them and take the cookie for yourself
choices.popUpText: They ran away crying. The cookie was delicious.

choices.choice_text: Take the cookie and break it in half
choices.popUpText: One of them grabbed both parts and ran away. The other went away crying. Well done!

datas.text: Your teacher gave you an unfair grade.

choices.popUpText: It gave you no pleasure, but you kept your cool and studied hard.
They talked with the principal and your teacher was fired.
After insulting the teacher, you got detention. You had to watch those boring Captain America lecture videos.

datas.text: A car did not stop at a pedestrian crossing and near-missed you.

choices.choice_text: Throw a stone at the car
choices.popUpText: The stone broke the car's window. The driver jumped out and chased you, but could not catch you.

choices.choice_text: Raise your hands and yell at the car
choices.popUpText: The driver stopped and apologized. You hoped that he took his lesson.
The same car was passing the same crossing in the next day and hit you hard this time. You were injured!

datas.text: A vendor wants to sell you a strange plant seed.

choices.choice_text: Buy it and plant in a pot in your house
choices.popUpText: It grew enormously and ate all of your cookies. You had to cut it down.
It was the last time you saw that vendor. Who was she?!
The seed gave you some extra strength and thinking capabilities.

datas.text: The neighbors are making too much noise with a party.

choices.choice_text: Knock on their door and complain
choices.popUpText: They promised to keep quiet, but increased the stereo's volume after you left. It was a terrible night for you.
They finished the party before the police showed up. The officer scolded you and gave you a fine for wasting their time.

choices.choice_text: Buy some drinks and try to join the party
choices.popUpText: It was a great party and you enjoyed it a lot. But it was not so good for your health.

datas.text: You found an injured dog on the street.

choices.popUpText: You brought it home and fed it, but you could not understand its injury and it died.

choices.choice_text: Take it to an animal hospital
choices.popUpText: The animal doctor took care of the dog. It was taken into a shelter for treatment.
Why are you so evil?

datas.text: You found out that one of your friends forges fake bills.

choices.popUpText: The police caught your friend and he was sent to prison.
You enjoyed spending some extra cash.

choices.choice_text: Ask him to stop doing it
choices.popUpText: He and his thug friends gave you a beating. You never saw him again.

datas.text: Your neighbor asks for some sugar and flour.

choices.popUpText: She cooked some delicious cakes and brought some for you later. They were delicious!

choices.choice_text: Gave her salt, but tell her that's sugar
choices.popUpText: It was too late until she realized your prank. She was quite mad at you for her salty cakes.
She called you a 'selfish person' and left. As if you are her personal supermarket!

datas.text: A shady scientist wants to use your body for some experiments.

choices.choice_text: Accept it and take the red pill
choices.popUpText: You felt strange and started to feel artsy after the experiment.

choices.choice_text: Accept it and take the blue pill
choices.popUpText: You got dizzy and suddenly felt great strength.
Your body, your choice!

datas.text: You are forced to spend an evening with your annoying cousin.

choices.popUpText: She played terrible and you got an easy victory. You found great joy in her sorrow.
She ordered some very expensive meals and ran away after eating, forcing you to pay.
She kept complaning for the whole night. It was very hard for you. You suddenly felt older.

datas.text: A ghost started to haunt you during the nights.

choices.popUpText: It grew more and more annoying. He was singing One Direction songs. He left the house after a month of torturing you.

choices.choice_text: Try to use a vacuum cleaner on him
choices.popUpText: It possessed the vacuum cleaner and messed up your house with dust. You had to throw the cleaner away.
He came swiftly and caught the ghost with a mouse trap. He did not even asked for money. 'I do it for fun!' he said.

datas.text: You dropped your fork on floor. What to do?

choices.choice_text: Lean down and try to pick it up
choices.popUpText: While leaning, you broke some of your bones!
You can use your hands after all.

choices.choice_text: Get a new fork from the kitchen
choices.popUpText: Modern problems require modern solutions.

datas.text: A white bearded man in white robes approached you on the street and wanted you to follow him.

choices.popUpText: Together, you visited dozens of houses and distributed meals to the poor people. His magical suitcase had unlimited meals in it. At the end of the day, he told you, 'we were already pleased with your kind nature and you proved your kindness today as well. Keep going, mortal.' Then he vanished!

choices.choice_text: Ask him, 'who are you? And why?!'
choices.popUpText: He frowned and turned his back on you. 'You failed the test.' he said and then vanished! WHO WAS HE?!
He was shocked by your reaction. He stared at you for a while and then went away.

datas.text: A dark hooded man approached you in the night and wanted you to keep doing evil deeds. He presented you a list of good people to bother.

choices.choice_text: Take the list and get on the job
choices.popUpText: You traveled all day around to bother random people. They were mostly kind old people and innocent children. At the end of the day, the dark hooded guy re-appeared again and winked at you.

choices.choice_text: Ask him how can you trust him
choices.popUpText: He got angry and slapped you. 'How dare you question me?!' he yelled. He took back the list from you and vanished.

choices.choice_text: Tear down the list and reject to do this evil deed
choices.popUpText: The dark hooded man was shocked to see that. He started crying and left you alone.
